product_name: Bear Grylls Down Sleeping Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When the temp drops below freezing, rest assured that a warm, comfortable night is ahead in the women's Bear Grylls Down Sleeping Bag. Light down insulation provides excellent warmth and packability.
